description:
SAY GOODBYE TO CLOGGED PORES AND HELLO TO CLEAR, SMOOTH SKIN!

Eliminate blackheads, pimples and blocked pores with the MCoBeauty Blackhead & Pimple Remover Set, two dual-ended metal tools designed to gently remove breakouts and impurities. Features different loops and a needle to target imperfections with precision and ease.

QUICK FACTS:

  • HELPS REMOVE STUBBORN PIMPLES & BLOCKED PORES
  • 2Â DOUBLE-ENDED TOOLS
  • MADE FROM PREMIUM QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL

DIRECTIONS:

Use the thin loop to squeeze blackheads and small whiteheads. If required, use the needle to gently prick the top of the pimple, creating an opening to release the breakout. Glide the larger loop against pores or blackheads to release congestion. The triangle loop helps extract more stubborn breakouts and larger pimples.

1.Cleanse your face using warm water to allow pores to easily open.

2.Glide the larger loop across your T-zone or wherever you experience enlarges pores to remove blackheads and congestion.

3.For targeted removal, position the thinner loop around the blackhead or small whitehead and press down to extract.

4.For stubborn breakouts, press the thinner loop against one side of the pimple to create gentle pressure, easing the blockage out.

5.If necessary, gently prick the pimple or blackhead with the needle, then extract with your chosen loop.
name: Mcobeauty Blackhead & Pimple Remover Set Each
